cleanDesc:
Schwaben Water Pump Pulley Holder for Removal of Fan Clutch
       ...
short-description: Replacing the fan clutch on most BMW models requires holding the water pump pulley while removing the fan clutch lock nut. With less than 1 1/2" clearance on some models this project can easily turn into a mechanical nightmare. Using our special slim line fan clutch wrench in conjunction with the appropriate pulley spanner, the removal and installation required only a few moments.

When it comes to BMW's we all know the weak point is commonly in the cooling system, many models proving hard to bleed the air pockets out after the refresh. The coolant refill tool solves this problem, ensuring that you get an air pocket free fill. The entire task is as simple as draining the system like normal, reinstalling the drain plugs and hooking the tool up to your refill location. The reason this tool works so well is due to the venturi valve, it converts air pressure from the compressor to vacuum inside the cooling system, then with a twist of a valve sucks coolant right into the system using the vacuum pressure.
Straighten bent fins in heat exchangers like radiators, condensers, and intercoolers obstruct air flow and reduce heat transfer. Paper-thin fins are easily bent, even by slight pressure.

These pliers feature a spring loaded clamp with a 24" cable and will lock onto the clamp and hold open for easy removal. These pliers are designed to remove metal or plastic self-tightening hose clamps with diameters from 11/16" to 2-1/2" ( 18 to 54mm).

The Schwaben Coolant Vacuum Fill Tool ensures no air pockets get into your cooling system while you're replacing your coolant - intended for use to refill your cooling system, not for removal. Can be used with Schwaben fluid extractors or with shop air - standard air compressor with a minimum rating of 90 PSI (6.2 bar). Includes all fittings and adapters necessary for use, with a molded storage case to keep your Schwaben Vacuum Fill Tool pristine for future use.

cleanDesc: Schwaben Long-Reach 32mm Open End Fan Clutch Wrench
short-description: This tool was specifically designed for the tight clearances needed to remove most BMW fan clutches. Its slim design lets it fit into tight areas, and the extra-long length is ideal for fan shroud clearance.

cleanDesc: Schwaben Cooling System Pressure Tester Kit
short-description: Are you refreshing your coolant system or having issues with coolant loss? An easy way to test your system for leaks and ensure you're able to maintain pressure without coolant loss is the Schwaben Cooling System Pressure Tester Kit.
Used to remove your fan clutch

cleanDesc: Trunk Tool Kit Water Pump Pliers - E36 E46 E30 E39

Having a complete tool kit is handy for quick repairs or it can save you in case of roadside failures. Also a complete tool kitis must when selling a car. The Evans Analog Refractometer tests for residual water in your cooling system after converting to Evans Waterless Coolant. Evans recommends using their Refractometer to ensure that water content is <3% (54.4 Brix) so that your engine can fully benefit from all of the improved cooling properties of Evans Waterless Coolant.

cleanDesc: Astro Pneumatic Flexible Hose Clamp Pliers

short-description: Pliers have adequate clamping force to seal large or pressurized cooling system hoses. These pliers are great for clamping shut most hoses. Swivel jaws ensure even clamping force.

cleanDesc: S54 Valve Adjustment Shim Set - With Tools
short-description: Proper valve lash adjustment is critical for longevity and performance. If your S54 is due for valve adjustment maintenance you can do it yourself with this kit, saving hundreds of dollars in labor charges.

cleanDesc:
Schwaben 32mm / 36mm Fan Clutch and Oil Filter Cap Open-End Wrench
...
short-description: Why buy two tools when you can get one that will do many jobs like this open end wrench? It is great for removing and installing the fan clutch and plastic oil filter cap. Also works great for removing and installing the VAN0S solenoid on M50 engine family. Use the same tools the Turner Motorsport tech's use!

cleanDesc: Gear Wrench Angled Hose Clip Pliers
short-description: This tool is a variation of our popular 3976 Flat Band Hose Clamp Pliers and features 45º jaws with swivel tips to grip at any angle and pliers that latch securely in position.
